column2: an A.M. Eatery////Snooze is a perfect blend of a coffee cafe and breakfast Â and brunch lounge. The vibe is absolutely positive
column5: the service was great and the coffee was perfect! The unique breakfast foods with a twist of healthy ingredients like fruit and some guilty pleasures like chocolate
column8: fruit topped pancakes and much more. I opted for a plain pancake and a basic 2 egg breakfast and the pancake was too thick and heavy. I would give it a five star
column9: but pancakes are to be light and fluffy.
